Pre-Game Insights: Germany are entering the match off the back of successive friendly wins over France and the Netherlands.Ukraine have a five-game unbeaten run, with four wins in the process.Germany have not played a competitive game since their 4-2 success over Costa Rica in the 2022 World Cup.Ukraine were knocked out in the group stage of the 2012 and 2016 European Championships.Germany are bidding to improve on their showing at Euro 2020, where they were knocked out in the round of 16.Ukraine will play three friendlies ahead of Euro 2024, facing Germany, Poland, and Moldova.Germany will host Ukraine at the Max-Morlock-Stadion on June 3, 2024.Germany's team includes youth and experience, with Toni Kroos set to retire after the tournament.Ukraine's squad features several big names, including Oleksandr Zinchenko and Mykhaylo Mudryk.
Post-Match Reflections: Germany are expected to secure a win against Ukraine.The match is seen as a strong preparation for Euro 2024 for both teams.Ukraine will be tough opponents for Germany due to their quality.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is Germany's first friendly before the Euro 2024 tournament.Ukraine's performance in the match is crucial before their Euro 2024 opener against Romania.Germany's absence of key players like Antonio Rudiger and Marc-Andre ter Stegen due to the Champions League final.Ukraine's recent form and preparation ahead of the European Championship.
